metadata.description: Production-grade fullstack workflow: Superpowers methodology + Everything-Claude-Code breadth

plugins.name: senior-fullstack-superpowers
plugins.description: Production-grade fullstack development workflow combining Superpowers methodology (brainstorm → plan → TDD → subagent execution → review → verify) with Everything-Claude-Code breadth (agents, security, multi-language rules). For TS/React/Next.js, Node.js/Bun, Python/FastAPI/Django, and Go.
